name: mern-stack-basic-project
description: Basic setup - MERN STACK!  1. npm init -y 2. npm i express mongoose nodemon 3. created folder - backend 4. npx create-react-app frontend -> no capital letters in naming folder 5. app.js create and models folder followed by user.js and connecting with the database. 6. created .env file in the root folder  7. created folder - dbConfig to connect with the db. 8.  tried to run - connecting error -> permission denial
